# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Data files
*.csv
*.xlsx
*.json
data/raw/*
!data/raw/README.md

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints

# Environment variables
.env

# Virtual environment
venv/
env/

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
